ProductInfo.Features:
4th Generation Intel® CoreTM i7-4700MQ Quad Core Processor 2.4GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.40GHz; Windows 8 64-Bit
17.3-inch diagonal Full HD Anti-glare LED-backlit display (1920 x 1080); 2GB (2048MB) NVIDIA(R) GeForce GT 740M Dedicated Graphics with Optimus Technology
500GB SSD (Dual 250GB Performance SATA III) Solid State Hard Drives; 16GB DDR3L 1600MHz SDRAM (2 DIMM)
Intel® 2x2 802.11b/g/n WLAN and Bluetooth® 4.0 plus WiDi Support with Intel® Smart Connect Technology; Blu-ray Writer with SuperMulti DVD burner
Full Size Backlit Keyboard; Beats AudioTM with four speakers; 6 Cell Battery; 120 Watt Power Supply; 2 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY 17 Quad Edition Laptop, Intel® CoreTM i7-4700MQ, Full HD Anti-glare LED 1080p Display, 500GB (Dual 250GB) SSD Hard Drives, Blu-Ray Writer/Burner, Backlit Keyboard, 2GB (2048MB) NVIDIA Graphics, 16GB DDR3L RAM; EXTREME BEAST (XB-1) 17t-j000 in Silver
